snippet.title: Super Mario Galaxy 64 DS Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspired by the hoax video from 2007 by Pablo Belmonte, Super Mario Galaxy 64 DS is a ROM hack of Super Mario 64 DS. We intend to demake the entirety of Super Mario Galaxy for the DS, within reason and maybe with some tweaks.

The goal is to have this hack function on everything, and, so far, it should. It's been tested with DesMuMe and a 2018 R4 Gold
 Pro cartridge inserted into various models of 3DS and DS, including the original classic model.

The Super Mario Galaxy 64 DS Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/supermariogalaxy64ds

More info about this hack, as well as some other hacks for Mario 64 DS can be found in the SM64DS Hacking Discord: http://discord.gg/PhpA9Wt
The first demo is still in progress. Check the discord link to stay updated.

This video is part of a larger presentation about other Super Mario 64 DS ROM hacks as seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P1wx81Jbhig&t=0s

Video edited by Fallen Logic
Custom code by Pants 64
Textures by RedPoisonDragon and SightSeeker
Troubleshooting by Poudink
